link_desc:
Pair of Powershell scripts that can be used to monitoring Sentinel/Aladdin HASP. Zabbix's Low-level Discovery (LLD) protocol are supported.

Note both of script can be used with Zabbix 2.0, but template provided for Zabbix 2.4 only.

1. Script that fetch NetHASP Monitor data using hsmon.dll (with compiled on fly .NET DLL wrapper). No third-party applications like HaspMonitor.exe, sed.exe will used.

Help to get any metric values of:

  • Servers;
  • Modules;
  • Slots;
  • Logins.

2. Script that fetch metric values of USB HASP Keys connected locally or with USB/IP

Help to get state of:

  • physical USB device;
  • logical HASP device.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Agent Active|Custom Script
author: sadman
